description: "We cannot erect walls" to its availability, he says, in his first online Christmas Day message.
title: Pope urges coronavirus vaccine access for all
title_page: Pope urges coronavirus vaccine access for all - BBC News
maintext: "At this moment in history, marked by the ecological crisis and grave economic and social imbalances only worsened by the coronavirus pandemic, it is all the more important for us to acknowledge one another as brothers and sisters."
